channel.title: Gauntlet Community - The Gauntlet Forums
channel.description: Topics in the 'Gauntlet Community' category For general discussion of the Gauntlet Gaming Community, as well as Gauntlet-created content like our blog, podcasts, and Gauntlet Community Open Gaming. (Not for miscellaneous/general discussions nor finding players.)

item.title: Open Hearth Gaming Community
item.dc:creator: @Haladir
item.description:
@Haladir wrote:

For anyone who’s not on the Slack… Gauntlet Publishing and the former Gauntlet Gaming Community have officially parted ways. The new community is Open Hearth Gaming. My understanding is that the parting was amicable on both sides, but any parting is going to be painful.

https://openhearthgaming.com/

Open Hearth Gaming is a direct successor. Please see that site for more details. If you’re on the former Gauntlet Slack, it has been renamed Open Hearth Gaming and your membership should carry over.

[Posting as a community member: I’m not part of the leadership team on either Gauntlet Publishing or Open Hearth Gaming.]

Posts: 5

Participants: 5

Read full topic

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 14, 2023
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Beam Saber
  • Hollows
  • Masks
  • Mountain Home
  • Primetime Adventures
  • Star Trek Adventures
  • Stellar Conflict
  • The Between
  • The King’s Poisoner

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players! If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
